<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="6386" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="6386" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.14</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="3967">3,967</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="249"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>White Suede</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. <b>White Suede</b> was launched in 2009. Top notes are Thyme and Tea; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley, Saffron and Rose; base notes are Suede, Musk, Sandalwood, Olibanum and Amber. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>In September 2009, Tom Ford presented collection White Musk Collection that contains four new fragrances: Urban Musk, White Suede, Musk Pure and Jasmin Musk. The collection is based upon the essence of musk, which is one of the favorite ingredients of Tom Ford. These fragrances are very feminine, a little bit lighter by color and by composition comparing to the previous editions.</p>

<p>White Suede is blended out of rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede and sandalwood.</p>

<p>The first three fragrances were created in the cooperation with Givaudan perfumers, while the White Suede was composed with Firmenich. The fragrances are available in very modern and elegant bottles of 50 ml.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346717" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>White Suede aims for soft warmth, but the suede overwhelms the floral musk I usually enjoy. Not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2346717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2346717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LayAmanda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457831.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LayAmanda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457831">LayAmanda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft white musk + leather and suede with a bit of stinky olibanum note.<br />
<br />
It's really clean and feels like very soft. Really suitable chill weather as autumn and winter season, it would be best when I try it on outfits with knit or cardigan types.<br />
<br />
Feedbacks from my friends and family were quite positive. They described the scent as musky and comforting, likening it to the feeling of being embraced with a warm heart. I personally experienced the same sensation, finding it particularly enjoyable during days when I wore White Suede. However, I often had headaches when I take transportation or in poor health conditions. On the day in question, the scent was quite pungent, contrasting sharply with the positive associations I had with the scent of White Suede on days with better conditions, where I perceived it as both soft and musky.<br />
<br />
I tried this perfume for long term and now I can conclude that this perfume could express its notes as different by each day for each conditions. Performance was long enough as it lasts at least 5 hours. Sillage was also great compared to the other musk-accord perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2344806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2344806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331305" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="myadkov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/540034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.540034.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="myadkov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/The-Ghost-In-The-Shell-69412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Ghost In The Shell"title="The Ghost In The Shell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331305ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331305" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2328038" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShowMustGoOn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShowMustGoOn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Suede"title="White Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2328038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2328038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775">ShowMustGoOn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-26">10/26/24 03:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sitting on a white suede couch in heaven after a nice shower  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2328038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2328038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Galbanum108"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706291"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1706291.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Galbanum108" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1706291">Galbanum108</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When there's a lot to do, all the loud smells are annoying, and all you want to do is lie under a plaid in bed next to your cat washing up. This perfume smells just like the clean fur on the belly of a British cat. But only if the spray is done on the body. If on paper or clothes in a closet, it can actually smells like an ashtray. Suede needs a warm body. Unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2306756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2306756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277857" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samwindrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2170773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samwindrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Sellier-58572.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58572.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sellier"title="Sellier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170773">samwindrose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-10">09/10/24 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok, so this is incredible. In the beginning it smelt a lot like something my mother would wear. I detested it. Powdery and too flowery-sweet for my taste. What remains after a while is a beautiful powdery floral leather scent. I could definitely get the thyme and lily of the valley. The sweetness faded and it ended up smelling of a more spring-y powdery suede scent. Classy, more feminine, perfect for light academia aesthetics.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2277857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2277857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Do yourselves a favor and train your nose better. I don't even wanna say anything about "bandaid" "artificial this or that" comments without humiliating them.<br />
Definitely a great scent to draw in attention and compliments at office meetings or formal occasions not for clubbing or girls night out lol.<br />
Totally unisex.<br />
Not loud but I can smell it on my skin after 6+ hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2244654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2244654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't get enough of this beauty, only minus is that it doesn't last as long as I would like it to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2223252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2223252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450019">REDLINE0007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 21:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow what an amazing fragrance we have here. If you like Initio Musk Therapy you might want to give White Suede a try. In the meantime I would rather stay away from some negative comments about this fragrance. There are plenty of bozos that like to copy/paste reviews over here. For example since when Tom Ford fragrances became "simple", "basic", "nauseating", "cheap smelling" "bandaid" which is band-aid but really...all of the reviewing individuals most likely had never smelled a bottle of genuine Tom Ford White Suede. But they surely love to leave tons of absurdity in the comment section below. Hahahhaha cheap band- aid smell, oh my goodness. At least thanks for not seeing "negative fakery bozo comments" like: "it smells like toilet airfreshener" or a house cleaning supplies etc. People you need to expand your imagination and clear your nose palate and smell receptors of all the bs all the dupes and fakery. And btw the batch code of my bottle is DA223139. Stay happy, healthy and wealthy ladies &amp; gentlemen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2210568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2210568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2172136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frangipanilove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.528960.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frangipanilove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Aqua-Vitae-Forte-31404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Vitae Forte"title="Aqua Vitae Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960">Frangipanilove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an example of a perfume I dislike. Vinyl like suede with artificial sandalwood and a hefty dose of white musks, with some artificial lily of the valley on top. On the plus side - not a cheap smelling version of the above combination - but still falls into truly dislike category for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2114068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2114068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100877" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Cant get behind this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2100877"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2100877#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2098387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrauntie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993322"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1993322.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrauntie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Constantinople-68998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Constantinople"title="Constantinople"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2098387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2098387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993322">Fragrauntie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-20">03/20/24 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had the same bottle of this for 10 years, which shows how infrequently I've reached for it. Until today, that is, when I decided to spray it over the top of Carner Barcelona Cuir and discovered the alchemical formula for turning lead into gold. <br />
 On its own, White Suede is polite but unremarkable. Surprisingly generic for a suede/musk. It's never been too assertive for wearing in office environments, but it's also never been interesting enough to be worn out of them. But when layered with a true leather? Listen, I keep catching whiffs of myself, and I'm giving myself dirty ideas. Another Tom Ford that just didn't go quite far enough and could have been great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2098387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2098387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's very casual and a go-to fragrance like one can wear any day any where at any time. Perfect for college, work, travelling and a wedding too, it engages with every body chemistry. Extremely synthetic, kind of reminds me of Lazy Sunday Morning in its sharp lily of the valley note. <br />
<br />
3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2048234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2048234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046264" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vickyoli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839679"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1839679.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vickyoli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839679">Vickyoli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love Tom Ford perfumes that have leather. So I was expecting to feel the suede on this one but I cant feel it. It reminded me a cheap purple baby cologne that pharmacies sell in my country. It is not bad, but not something you expect from Tom Ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2046264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2046264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040735" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="natk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632818"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632818.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="natk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632818">natk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Appalling performance. Just terrible. Same batch (B12) as the reviewer's below. If I'm paying close to $500 (for 100ml) then I expect the fragrance to last more than 15 minutes and project at least a little bit. I like "polite" fragrances with a small scent bubble, I don't want huge sillage, but this is simply unacceptable.<br />
<br />
If anyone knows another 'suede+musk' worth trying - please share here or pm me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2040735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2040735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Musky, leathery, floral but if the right woman isn't wearing it then it may smell like an old lady. You need the right woman to draw the visual connection to so you aren't reminded of your grandmother</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2038310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2038310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you used to love white suede original formula you gonna be shocked with the new batches, I bought my bottle from Heathrow Airport and the patch is B12.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Reminiscent of the flower-shaped soap balls that my grandmother kept in a crystal bowl in her bathroom that were for decoration only and NOT to be used especially by curious and bored pre-teen boys. Leans more feminine than masculine. The only way I can see this as unisex is if you layered it with TF Ombre Leather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="2024784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=2024784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165138">Suelll</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 23:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I finally tested this and couldnt for the life of me figure out why it smelled so familiar until just now. Yes yes its powdery and musky etc. but I couldnt let go to fully appreciate white suede for what it is because it smells like something in my perfume storage container . Due to lack of cupboard space, I transferred all my less used bottles which are SIB to a big container. Guess what, every time I open the container it smells like white suede because in it is where I also keep my NR for him EDT and EDP. So for me white suede=waft of NR for him. The similarity becomes more apparent as the top and middle notes of white suede lose intensity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1967375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1967375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964176" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honeyes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1328370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honeyes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Aqua-Vitae-Forte-31404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Vitae Forte"title="Aqua Vitae Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964176ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964176" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328370">Honeyes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im really confused, where does THAT ashtray smell come from? It could be a great perfume but those ashtray notes ruin it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1964176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1964176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960355" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AquaRegia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AquaRegia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960355ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960355" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722206">AquaRegia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-25">10/25/23 05:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford's White Suede embodies the essence of suede leather and white musk, an artful fusion captured in a fragrance. It effortlessly balances sophistication and casual charm, making it an ideal choice for the office. Its notes weave a tale: thyme and tea in the top, lily-of-the-valley, saffron, and rose in the heart, and a foundation of suede, musk, sandalwood, olibanum, and amber.<br />
<br />
Though marketed for women, its allure is equally inviting to both genders. Subtle and elegant, it's a masterpiece in minimalism that exudes professionalism. A dual nature emerges as it harmonizes cleanliness and freshness with warmth and coziness.<br />
<br />
White Suede is like a mirror image of another iconic Tom Ford fragrance, Fucking Fabulous. The former, innocent and pure, grew up to become the enigmatic FF. If you're captivated by the darker charm of FF, White Suede's tender elegance will sweep you off your feet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1960355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1960355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928580" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cyclone1391"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.666114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cyclone1391" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114">cyclone1391</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Damn. Literally the involuntary out loud response I had to this fragrance upon opening it. My only complaint is that I wish it had a larger scent bubble. This smells like ambition, made me a bit emotional actually. Wearing this and studying for my master's degree. Like I'm finally becoming the woman I always thought I would be as a child but then thought was unattainable as "real life" set in. This fragrance motivates me to be better. Clean, but not aldehydic, leather but not animalic. Not just "your skin but better," but your skin as your best self.<br />
<br />
Update: I live rurally and have an infant. Local Walmart was out of baby wipes so I got equate flushable wipes instead and they are a dupe of this  still smells great but now the association is burned in my mind. This is why I always get a travel size before full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1928580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1928580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1928071" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LostSock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1500461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LostSock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-pour-Homme-2003-691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"title="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1928071ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1928071" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); <br />
Does anyone know why the bottle I have is in a black bottle like a load of TF, yet whenever I see this stuff for sale it's in a clear one? Batch code A76.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1928071"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1928071#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1921385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1921385" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amudrechenko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1708795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amudrechenko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1921385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1921385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708795">amudrechenko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-06">09/06/23 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's beautiful and musky! I agree with the reviewers that it's a very soft and warm kind of musk. I do not detect any incense or ash-tray like notes. The perfume is not strong either. It's very airy and light to me. I mostly detect leather and musk, but I fail to detect much of the florals. I actually prefer that as I am not a fan of the lily, it's a bit too floral for me usually.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1921385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1921385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Schmellin_Good"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202859"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202859.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Schmellin_Good" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202859">Schmellin_Good</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 10:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like the person below me, I picked up a 50ml for $125 from the Cosmetics Company Store. Great deal.<br />
<br />
Really clean, silky suede &amp; musk. This is a "your skin but better" fragrance executed flawlessly.<br />
<br />
For what it is, 9/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1918750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1918750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1889960" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greg.3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="greg.3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1889960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1889960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625">greg.3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-29">07/29/23 14:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked up Tom Ford White Suede from my local Cosmetic Company Store at the local outlets yesterday, and have been wearing it today.   Unlike some of the other reviews this year on Fragrantica, I do not pick up very much suede/leather in this.  Opening is very strong of perfumer's alcohol, then settles down after 60 seconds to a white floral and tea scent.  I think I smelled a bit of citrus accord in there, but I don't see any citrus listed -- either way, the sweetness in the opening is short-lived.   Performance is fair, but not great.  I put two close sprays on my inner arm around 10am this morning, and now at 5pm it's a very light skin scent.  I'd say 4-6 hours of usable performance, and it will be completely gone by 8.<br />
<br />
If you are interested in this, check your local Cosmetic Company Store (an Estee Lauder owned outlet) and see if they have some in stock.   Everything Tom Ford is 50% off, and yesterday they had an extra 15% off on top of that.   My $295 retail 50ml bottle ended up costing $125.35 + tax.   Lot on my bottle is A92.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1889960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1889960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheWoodman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290353.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheWoodman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/African-Leather-31383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Leather"title="African Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290353">TheWoodman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 04:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very quick review, overhyped, generic and really not worth the price, i bought it just to have it in my collection but wish i had not, not for what i paid. Poor projection, thank god, has a metallic and strange herbal quality. DO NOT BLIND BUY. TF really must have giggled when mixing this. Older person kind of smell IMO but not a pleasant one. In the same bracket as BR540 for me, bought so I could say i have it but really does not work on me. <br />
Orchid Soleil, however, beautiful. Much better to be had from this house</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1876826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1876826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silthrill"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449134"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1449134.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silthrill" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orphon Eau de Parfum"title="Orphon Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449134">silthrill</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-10">07/10/23 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sexy ashtray vibes. This is one of those fragrances that I shouldn't like but I actually love, and that make me question what happened in my formative years to cause me to like this. It's a little smokey, a little leathery, a little powdery, a little musky. This is a more feminine version of F*cking Fabulous, but still unisex. It's for when you want to smell clean and dirty at the same time. Wholesome people won't like this. If you had a dysfunctional childhood then it's a 10/10. Full bottle worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1875799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1875799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stimul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/281879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.281879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stimul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/L-Eau-Revee-D-Ikar-78746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau Rve D'Ikar"title="L'Eau Rve D'Ikar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/281879">Stimul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-08">07/08/23 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very, very first spray - ashtray. I wonder why ashtray was not listed in the pyramid.<br />
But a fatcat ashtray - fortune lodge ashtray.<br />
<br />
I like it though. Ashtray you envy and want to be a part of.<br />
<br />
This is a very positive review!<br />
I actually wear this with pleasure mid summer hot weather. Yes, wet wipes in best possible meaning. On my skin this perfume is something I could always wear - I feel myself clean and good smelling.<br />
<br />
I also find it very versatile - Sunday mood, sporty spirit, lover hugs, motherhood hustle, let's talk serious business, office speed - it suits it all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I think this is just better version of lady white snake</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1866308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1866308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1860342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1860342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="benkim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/351263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="benkim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sospiro-Perfumes/Vibrato-75930.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75930.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vibrato"title="Vibrato"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1860342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1860342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/351263">benkim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-20">06/20/23 00:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really really really wanted to like this. 6 different occasions I wore and scrubbed off soon after, I've come to conclude that certain synthetic musk does not sit well with me. To me, this is a bipolar fragrance - components of "clean" and "dirty/tarry", which soon overcomes the cleanliness and burns down the whole composition. Awesome projection however, I will give the credit for that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1860342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1860342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853647" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's something so nostalgic about White Suede. She smells reminiscent of my grandmother's laundry room. Very clean, fresh, and slightly floral. She definitely takes some time to get used to, but once you settle in her skin she's pretty nice. Definitely not a perfume to wear if you want to draw in attention and compliments. It's more of a relaxing scent for you to enmesh in her glory. Definitely a great take on musk. I think she's perfect for the fall, winter, &amp; early spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1853647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1853647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1850594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MadameMerola"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720283"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720283.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MadameMerola" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1850594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1850594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720283">MadameMerola</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-06">06/06/23 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh well, I knew I was soon going to get a huge miss with my blind buys. This is one scent I just cant get into, no matter how much I try. It just doesnt enthrall my senses and it doesnt have a nice balance with my skin chemistry. I guess it is the thyme. Love it in my food, hate it on my skin. Thankfully, I didnt splurge on a full bottle otherwise I would have cried my eyes out. Tobacco Vanille remains my favourite from TF. White Suede and Neroli Portofino are in my never ever list. For those who love it, I am happy it works for you. I am just one of the people that cant. I always have to layer it something else because I cant bear the smell for more than 30 minutes when I wear it alone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1850594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1850594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1850525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1850525" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaContessina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaContessina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barnia"title="Barnia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1850525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1850525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645">LaContessina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-06">06/06/23 12:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very subdued, powdery clean musk; has a strange note that seems quite smokey to my nose, but is could be also the thyme (that has a strong, almost medicinal-burnt note).<br />
Smells clean and dirty at the same time. Intrigued but not sold on it. <br />
The big no for me is the sillage (non existent) and the longevity( non existent, after 10 minutes I have nothing on my skin).<br />
Almost interesting fragrance but a no-go for me, due to the exorbitant price and the low performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1850525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1850525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1846151" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
