padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1842473" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mae.si"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1644242.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mae.si" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Fortis-23084.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23084.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fortis"title="Fortis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1842473ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1842473" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644242">mae.si</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-26">05/26/23 15:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really, REALLY wanted to love this. T_T<br />
<br />
However, on my skin this smelled like old, dusty car smell - the kind with those greige felted seats, and fuzzy, cigarette stained carpets. <br />
<br />
I love leather scents and tea scents, but did not get either from this. Its such a well regarded fragrance, so maybe its just my skin chemistry! <br />
<br />
Blind bought and wore for 2 days, and promptly returned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1842473"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1842473#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; aromatic white florals becomes a musky &amp; slightly creamy suede. Very clean and very polished, feels like a grown up Jovan White Musk.<br />
Can be enjoyed all year round save the dead of summer.<br />
Lasts around 6 hrs, fairly moderate sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1839536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1839536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Msc1977"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Msc1977" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Leather-Eau-de-Cologne-Concentree-25349.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25349.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentre"title="Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293601">Msc1977</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This to me, is Tuscan leather, without the isobutyl quinoline note. ( The gasoline leather note)<br />
And rose instead of jasmine and no raspberry or vanilla. <br />
Very heavy with Lily of the valley type materials which make it soft and soapy. And a lot of different white musks to make it almost metallic, but soft and clean.<br />
Unisex for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1831593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1831593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820945" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="derby2169"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="derby2169" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884">derby2169</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-29">04/29/23 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unexpectedly hairspray-like suede with musk compounds. It gets quite powdery soon with a clear cosmetic element to it. Unapologetic in its industrial smelling suede note, think new soft leather shoes. <br />
<br />
Because of the aforementioned association I imagine a wealthy woman in her 40s with mask-type sunglasses wearing a long coat being able to really pull this off. Ultimately not something I would care for if I smelled on the opposite sex and certainly not something I could wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1820945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1820945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I took it blind and it was not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1820496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1820496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1815871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1815871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LittleMissYellow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LittleMissYellow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/RiRi-31629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="RiRi"title="RiRi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1815871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1815871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384379">LittleMissYellow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-23">04/23/23 16:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I haven't worn it yet as it was a anniversary gift bought yesterday  I've smelled it on numerous occasions though and everytime I'm just taken away by it's simple yet intriguing scent. I LOVE the suede note - very warm and inviting from the beginning .. but maybe not for the faint of noses. The tea note mixed with musk gives a clean and refined aura and the amber gives it this creamy... Cosy atmosphere. I feel that this can be worn in many different occasions. I already love it!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1815871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1815871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1811388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1811388" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MelissaKS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515447.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MelissaKS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Materi/Cacao-Porcelana-57099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cacao Porcelana"title="Cacao Porcelana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1811388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1811388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515447">MelissaKS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-17">04/17/23 23:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive been wearing this fragrance more since the beginning of spring and Im really enjoying it. I like the suede note more than I expected to. It starts off powdery, musky, and lightly floral plus suede. It dries into a sandalwood and amber scent later on. Its definitely my style right now (Im really into musky, powdery, and overall clean scents).<br />
<br />
The dry down, especially after a couple of hours, smells similar to Missing Person on my skin. Im gonna spray them on different arms and see how close they are on the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1811388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1811388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1805295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love to wear this at night and drink a tea, read a book or something and just relax.<br />

Creamy white musky sude. OMG ..want a bottle. This is what i was looking for! <br />
Drydown on skin... Screechy nineties perfume. A scrubber. Nose was in agony. And this was before I read the reviews. Noa? Haven't smelled that one since i was a teen but i believe you. So sad. The hunt continues. I'll just spray soleil neige bodyspray on dior homme intense to satify my hunt for a creamy sude lipsticky white florals frag and sigh some more. So close!<br />
<br />

Well balanced skin scent for those who love mellow projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1787966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1787966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1783165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1783165" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soozatska"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.958696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soozatska" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Benetton/Benetton-Hot-2488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Benetton Hot"title="Benetton Hot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1783165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1783165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958696">Soozatska</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-14">03/14/23 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased a sample of White Suede because so many Fragranticans endorsed it as being a dupe for Noa. Just adding an asterisk in this review that it is definitely the *reformulated* Noa that it smells like- not the ethereal musk of the original Noa.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1783165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1783165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781381" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1781381" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vintila R."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vintila R." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1781381ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1781381" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570569">Vintila R.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-11">03/11/23 21:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't ask me why but this is one of my favourite musks. I was surprised how much I liked it when I first discovered it. I was expecting a typical heavy floral musk but it's not. I can smell the soft suede right from the opening, which also offers an aromatic quality provided by the tea and thyme, it is fresh; the flowers are subtle and play a second role. The musk is in the background but it has a presence. It dries down as a soft and cosy skin scent/musk that can be sprayed before bed to feel relaxed but it can also turn sexy as I sweat. It is not powdery or creamy but it has texture. The suede note remains there as a silent note. It doesn't have an excellent projection, it lasts about 4 hours on my skin. I find it intimate. I get the lack of interest in this fragrance (it is a pricey musk after all) but it works for me.<br />
<br />
Edit: I still find it addictive but it's hard to wear this outside. I must be "well dressed" to pull this off; otherwise, I feel anachronic. The funny thing is I want to wear it mostly when I feel cosy at home, with my oversized turtle neck sweater.That's how intimate I find it. BTW: "Wholesome people won't like this. If you had a dysfunctional childhood then it's a 10/10. Full bottle worthy". That reviewer just nailed it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1781381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1781381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1762343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1762343" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MatchaCat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1669531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1669531.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MatchaCat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1762343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1762343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1669531">MatchaCat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-17">02/17/23 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is basically a white musk smell with subtle white florals in the background and a slight leather note. I don't get any powder from this. Just a very clean white musk, like those Egyptian musk perfume oils. The leather note is a bit sharp. If it were creamier, this would be a 10/10 perfume. However, it is still a very likable scent. It's not very strong but does last a long while on the skin. To my nose, this leans slightly more feminine due to the white florals in the background. <br />
<br />
Smell: 9 out of 10<br />
Longevity: 9 out of 10<br />
<br />
For reference, I'm female.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1762343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1762343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1756738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1756738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1756738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1756738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-10">02/10/23 10:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been wearing Cacharel Noa as a casual weekend scent recently, and when I smelled White Suede initially, that's what immediately came to mind. Like Noa, WS is a fresh, clean white musk scent with soft floral nuances. Subtle and inoffensive, it is very easy-to-wear, but is perhaps slightly overpriced in my opinion, despite its excellent composition. <br />
<br />
Musky from initial spray, WS is clean and bright. There is a herbal greenness to the opening too, adding freshness. I get some lily-of-the-valley here, paving the way to the florals.<br />
<br />
As it develops, some powdery rose emerges, marrying nicely with the musk to form that classic musky-rose accord. The amber base develops smoothly in the background, warm and slightly animalic, which alongside the musk, gives an authentic suede-like effect. Soft woody notes round it out as it dries down. It fades to a musky suede skin scent, smooth and satisfying. Sillage and longevity are moderate.<br />
<br />
An elegant, understated unisex everyday scent, WS is an easy reach and very versatile - a true year-round scent. A more upmarket, elevated Noa, featuring an unusually subtle, feminine take on a leather drydown. 4/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1756738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1756738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1750038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1750038" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iksir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417888"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417888.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iksir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Cafe-Rose-2023-83771.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83771.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caf Rose (2023)"title="Caf Rose (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1750038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1750038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417888">iksir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-02">02/02/23 14:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is everything I ever wanted to smell like! So refined.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1750038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1750038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1743079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1743079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="endlic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670276"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1670276.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="endlic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1743079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1743079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1743079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1743079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1735270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1735270" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Comrade Zagoryanskaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Comrade Zagoryanskaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/L-orpheline-26214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'orpheline"title="L'orpheline"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1735270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1735270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369401">Comrade Zagoryanskaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-16">01/16/23 03:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Noa meets Ombre Leather. Both - my all-time favourites: Noa for its sheer diffusive sweetness, softness and femininity, OL for its sharpness and bold yet refined unisex power statement; both - for immaculate quality. So being a huge fan of both I almost bought a  FB of White Suede just after one test from a blotter, but given the price had enough willpower to order a sample first and wear it a few times. I can very much feel and describe separate notes from both of the above mentioned perfumes but brought together they somehow neutralise each other. I dont know whether these dont mix well per se or just this very composition hasnt been assembled properly (read: to my taste)) but unfortunately for me the magic in this is not doubled but gone and the overall composition feels somewhat dull and yes (cudos to @itsmellslikerain below for finding the right word) - stale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1735270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1735270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1728603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1728603" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="itsmellslikerain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="itsmellslikerain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1728603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1728603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276594">itsmellslikerain</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-08">01/08/23 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From my 2015 bottle: <br />
<br />
The opening is reminiscent of a stale motel room. Youve just finished taking a shower with a rose scented scrub. After putting on a fresh white cotton T, and some jeans on, you dab the body shops white musc on your pulse points. You finish getting ready for the bright new day, ready to leave the shitty room behind. Not realizing the scent of stale cigarettes is still clinging to your hair</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1728603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1728603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1724601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1724601" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bob Cage"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bob Cage" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Marseille-70223.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70223.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marseille"title="Marseille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1724601ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1724601" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632502">Bob Cage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-03">01/03/23 23:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/10.  Soft.  Unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1724601"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1724601#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722650" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899874"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.899874.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/Cashmere-Palo-Santo-90134.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90134.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cashmere & Palo Santo"title="Cashmere & Palo Santo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722650ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722650" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/899874">alit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 15:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luxurious cosmetic wet wipes. And I mean that as a compliment. Clean, fresh, perfume-y wipes. As it dries down you get that brand-new-suede scent, slightly musky and very comforting. Overall a clean, contained, grown up and well behaved fragrance best fit for a day wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1722650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1722650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="httrung32"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516074"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516074.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="httrung32" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516074">httrung32</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 00:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelt this scent from a Tom Ford Candle in a gentlemens lounge, a sweet flowery musk and soft creamy white leather scent. It just clicked on me, it is like a nice-smelling classy guy/girl sitting on a luxurious white italian leather sofa. I am typically not into leather fragrances esp the strong bitter leather scents but the leather note in here is so smooth, classy, softly elegant, and totally unisex imo. When I smell the candle, I just knew that I have to get this fragrance soon, and wear it to work. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1721424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1721424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1720933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1720933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violeteme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violeteme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/Sisley-Eau-de-3-5852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sisley Eau de 3"title="Sisley Eau de 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1720933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1720933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189">violeteme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-30">12/30/22 09:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful softness. It truly smells similar to Noa, Noa might be just a bit more floral. But I only could tell minuscule differences if I had them both in front of me. Alone they even could be non-distinguishable. I also get similarity to Wisteria Hysteria. Pure, calm, subtle scent. Smells powdery, soapy and floral. Suede just adds some velvety texture.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1720933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1720933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; She always smelled good but smoked.  I swear this thing smells like a smokers clothing at times but damn..I have put more of a dent in this fragrance over the last 24 months than I have any other scent in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Very much a baby powder old lady musk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1687576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1687576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1683639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1683639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aarix"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579653"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579653.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aarix" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Black-Line-18049.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18049.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Line"title="Black Line"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1683639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1683639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579653">Aarix</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-08">11/08/22 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What's denoted as tea and thyme in the top notes produce an unpleasant  "CIGARETTE ASH!" accord on my skin (maybe *discord* is more the word ), but thankfully that dies down eventually. Unthankfully the drydown smells like. Um. Well these are some very cloying powdery florals, and this is a very sexy kind of musk. I am presented with the vivid image of hooking up on a leather sofa with an upper-middleclass chainsmoking grandma. I mean--get it, granny!! but I don't really want to smell like this :(<br />
<br />
Edit: presented this to a non-fumehead friend with zero preamble (I like to let people have a look thru my collection of small decants) and it didn't smell like ash on her, though it remained just as stuffy. She was like "wow this smells like my grandparent's place :/" ...And apparently her mother even agreed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1683639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1683639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't get any grandma feel from this. Since I bought this I've worn nothing else! This definitely smells unisex to me and isn't a crowd pleasing attention grabber, it's better than that! It just smells like you, it's natural and animalic but also clean and powdery with a slight hint of soapiness. Definitely my new signature. I haven't smelt this on anybody on yet I somehow feel like this is familiar to me. I'm not sure what it reminds me of I just adore it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1667403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1667403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1656912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1656912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dcjimr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1186069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dcjimr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1656912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1656912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069">dcjimr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-01">10/01/22 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I suggest testing this one first.  Immediately after I sprayed it I absolutely loved it.  On the ride home I started getting a hint of gasoline/petrol, which I did not enjoy.  How your nose reacts to this (positively or negatively...see the many lovely reviews below) will probably determine whether it succeeds for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1656912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1656912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1646494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1646494" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="downtomars13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="downtomars13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1646494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1646494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304522">downtomars13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-16">09/16/22 12:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is a lovely, sophisticated baby powder. And I LOVE baby powder scents. Then......... the leather comes out. And yes, it does smell like a new car at this point. Totally ruined it for me. Not a fan of suede notes, but was hoping it wouldn't be strong in this one. But sadly it is. If this could stay like the opening the whole way through, then I'd buy a fb. Sigh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1646494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1646494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1639242" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1639242" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rainingroses"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/663790"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.663790.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rainingroses" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paris-Corner/Voux-Patisserie-98264.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98264.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Voux Patisserie"title="Voux Patisserie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1639242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1639242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/663790">rainingroses</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-06">09/06/22 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm glad I tried this scent without reading the reviews first, because of how polarizing they are, oh, and I really don't like the 'new car' kind of smells, either. So that, admittedly, would have put me off trying it. <br />
<br />
To me, this smells very comforting. White Suede is like a hug in a bottle. It stays very close, the sillage isn't great, but that's fine because I wear it for me. It's so soft and skin-like...on me, the suede, musk and lily of the valley are the most prominent notes. Lily of the valley can sometimes smell really sharp and shrill on me, but in this fragrance it's tempered by the other notes and is much softer, although noticeably there. Later in the day, I get more sandalwood and less lily of the valley, but the suede and musk remains. To me, it's not a squaky clean musk scent, it's slightly more primal, dirtier, while at the same time being comforting and soothing. This is absolutely glorious, definitely my favorite musk scent, probably in my top 5 overall. A must have!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1639242"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1639242#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1617605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1617605" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentedddiary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1356152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentedddiary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1617605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1617605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356152">scentedddiary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-05">08/05/22 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This baby smells like a brand new expensive car when you first sit on the leather seats, all matte and soft and squeaky clean. The thyme and tea notes give it a fresh and airy start, while the musk and suede at the base hide a very sexy and dirty allure. It's such an understaded but highly refined scent that I feel could work perfectly for both men and women!! So so classy and absolutely signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1617605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1617605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1616496" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pilikins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.203182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pilikins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1616496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1616496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/203182">Pilikins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-03">08/03/22 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me this opens with a very strong gasoline smell which gradually diminishes but I feel its presence all the way through. I suspect this is what smells like suede to some and burned leather to others, but I get petrochemicals. The lily of the valley and musk are there too which is just odd. I think the musky accord is odd too. It is deceptive because there are the clean florals, but it is also indolic which makes it dirty. So all in all, its a good idea to test this first as you may be disappointed if you are expecting a clean musky perfume .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1616496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1616496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
