padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-03">08/03/22 04:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aaw I had high expetations of this as the sprayer of my sample smelled delicious, musky, powdery, unique, clean. But then i sprayed this on myself. Leather, rubber, smoke, someone described it really well few reviews below - you take some fake leather boots, put it in the microwave, starts burning, that's how this smells. Masculine, but not in a nice way. In fact it kind of smells like a charity shop. Old leather, cigarette smoke. Yes definitely smells like a smoker's clothing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1616007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1616007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1612376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1612376" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlinkaSun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1535481.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlinkaSun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/1888-21616.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21616.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1888"title="1888"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1612376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1612376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535481">AlinkaSun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-28">07/28/22 12:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really good option for a day time or office setting. Non offensive, not loud but yet interesting and quite different. Suede and lily are dominating notes and they go very well together. This perfume definitely smells clean, elegant and expensive. It does not project far which can be beneficial in an office settings. But I can definitely smell it on me for a good 3-4 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1612376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1612376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1599676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1599676" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AyeDeeBee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1385926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AyeDeeBee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dossier/Fruity-Almond-73740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fruity Almond"title="Fruity Almond"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1599676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1599676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1385926">AyeDeeBee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-09">07/09/22 09:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wrap new pair of leather boots in plastic, put them in the microwave, and take them out right before they start smoking. Thats what this smells like to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1599676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1599676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1567504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1567504" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trishaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trishaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1567504ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1567504" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458062">Trishaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-19">05/19/22 22:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It starts out with a baby powder smell, but on the dry down it turns into a more pleasant suede with musk with some white florals, but it was hard to tell what florals they were without looking at the note list. <br />
<br />
I weirdly get a small reminder of Tuscan Leather which is probably the suede note but I view this one more appropriate for both genders in comparison. It's well balanced and it feels quite special and super comforting as well. I've grown to really like this one actually, I recommend giving it a try if you like Soleil Blanc, Tuscan Leather or Tubreuse Nue even.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1567504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1567504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1563648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1563648" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bopha85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bopha85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Baker-Perfumes/Atlante-54777.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54777.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Atlante"title="Atlante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1563648ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1563648" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318378">Bopha85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-14">05/14/22 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first reference for frangances is anything creamy. THIS is the ULTIMATE creamy scent for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1563648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1563648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1553014" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="e2less"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="e2less" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Nanshe-64093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nanshe"title="Nanshe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1553014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1553014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290667">e2less</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-28">04/28/22 20:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was very surprised how much I love White Suede. This the best Sandalwood/musk in my collection.  The opening starts off kinda harsh but within 30mins the fragrance settles into fresh, musky, woodsy clean scent for any day occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1553014"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1553014#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1552487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Like a new car </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1552487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1552487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1528639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1528639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Hortus-Sanitatis-59838.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59838.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hortus Sanitatis"title="Hortus Sanitatis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1528639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1528639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-22">03/22/22 23:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression on tester: I couldn't smell it.<br />
Second and 3rd impressions on skin and I can smell it now. <br />
I can smell the jasmine and saffron on a base of suede musk.<br />
<br />
Ethereal white musk on an ultra clean suede. Doesn't leap of my skin (or stick to it unfortunately), even when over spraying. Feels like the anti perfume genre of scents. Super safe and office friendly. Bought a 100ml and sold it a month later because I got tired of it quickly. There's better musks and suede scents out there. <br />
<br />
Scent 7/10<br />
Performance 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1528639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1528639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1523181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1523181" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheLB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326739"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1326739.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheLB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Amo-Ferragamo-46832.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46832.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amo Ferragamo"title="Amo Ferragamo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1523181ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1523181" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1326739">TheLB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-14">03/14/22 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Expensive baby powder? I really dont like this to the point where I dont mind it? Did that make any sense? It smells old lady shower fresh. So not offensive but definitely not something I will be going for often. It feels heavy on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1523181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1523181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511060" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="trins777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223125.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="trins777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-33519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540"title="Baccarat Rouge 540"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223125">trins777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a weird one. Blind bought this and regret it. By the notes and reviews thought I would enjoy but this is nothing like other tom fords to me.<br />
I just can't seem to get over the opening spray of a soapy almost acidic smell, smells like my grandmas closet, very powdery. Almost makes me sick just thinking about it. Once it settles on the skin I get the floral notes but once again I am disappointed by the longevity, after a few hours can't seem to smell it even directly on my skin. <br />
Not my cup of tea, I guess this is what I get for stepping out of my comfort zone with a perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1511060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1511060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1509177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1509177" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="trabuquera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1065148"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1065148.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="trabuquera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Frustration-71611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Frustration"title="Frustration"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1509177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1509177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1065148">trabuquera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-21">02/21/22 13:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright, soapy, preppy, squeaky-clean fresh suede: far lighter and more floral than other TF variations on the theme of leather, and not quite as special as it thinks it is. Think of it as a slightly over-privileged heritage applicant to the scent Ivy Leagues: it absolutely qualifies and is at home in the high-class environment - but may not have the true originality and character to forge ahead and rule the world by right. <br />
<br />
Extraordinarily bright, big and fresh-from-the-shower at first, as it emerges seemingly shaking lather from its hair and splattering herbal, outdoorsy, top-of-the-morning vibes from the thyme and lily-of-the-valley - pretty femme and far, far more floral than I expected during this first half hour. (Is there unmentioned osmanthus in there too? Because it seems to lurk in the mix, very prettily too.) So at first, although it radiates pretty strongly - a bossy projecting burst across the room - this may seem not as billed at all. Where actually IS the promised suede?<br />
<br />
I tend to go for darker, spicier, more mature leathers, so perhaps it's unsurprising this opening flowerburst seemed a bit over-confident to me. But within the half hour, its animal spirit rises and the gentle, powdery funk of very finely-tanned soft leather swells up, coolly and classily: no reek of the barnyard or the garage, just whispery-velvety kid suede melding impeccably with the flowers and musk to form into a sleek, manicured, intensely civilised aura of prosperity and ease. As it fades and mellows, the suede really emerges as the deceptively soft backbone of the whole thing, modulating back and forth between leathery and powdery, getting more and more delicate (and to my nose more and more lovely) as it recedes, hanging on up to 6-7 hours on skin with far more enduring presence (days and days) on fabric. (A rare thing for me to enjoy a quieter, mellower drydown of a scent more than the start: usually the interesting stuff happens first, but not so here.) <br />
<br />
Bigger and a bit more brash, White Leather echoes (and amplifies) Hermessence Cuir d'Ange, but far louder and blinged-up: if CdA is an adorable innocent fluffy lamb, then TFWS might be a spirited but slightly ridiculous mini pedigree show pony. There's perceptible quality  - but is it really different enough from Evody's very respectable Cuir Blanc, almost a smellalike, to justify the steep price point? As with full Harvard tuition costs ... only your wealth level can make the decision. If you can afford it, it's worth it; but if you can't, there are several just-as-good things around for far far less.<br />
<br />
It's a truly polished performer and so pleasant to spend time with. Controlled enough to work in most settings, on both genders, in many sorts of weather. Absolutely nothing here to offend - there is none of the shock value of Knize Ten's greasy garagehand or Cuir Mauresque's crazy-boozy spicing. It impeccably ticks so many boxes - almost offhand, so smoothly and easily - and perhaps that's precisely why it doesn't quite make my heart sing. Is it trying hard enough? Maybe it's just a little too ... glib? ... for its own good - slightly assuming that it's more than good enough for anyone, including YOU, and coasting a little on that. But for soft-suede fans it will be a silky, sensuous delight.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1509177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1509177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504621" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1468348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1468348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1462292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1462292" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aqua76239"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.19867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aqua76239" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Gold-Coast-56778.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56778.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Coast"title="Gold Coast"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1462292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1462292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867">aqua76239</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-12">12/12/21 17:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is an odd scent to me-i thought I would like it based on notes but it smells like a suede coat. No, really. All this "delicate musk and florals" that people talk about-all that is overpowered by very loud suede note. Its kind of like what you imagine your mom's suede jacket smells it, with hint of floral perfume that she wears,  suede and skin. If you are into those types of scents, more power to you but its a total fail for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1462292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1462292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455549" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1455549" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sisina96rv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sisina96rv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Kashkha-CPO-54144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kashkha CPO"title="Kashkha CPO"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1455549ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1455549" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820">sisina96rv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-01">12/01/21 09:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love at first sniff <br />
<br />
If you are like me who has love-hate relationship with a leather note &amp; love-hate relationship with Tom Ford fragrances, give this a try! Everything is so delicately blended into one wonderful smell that I am shook myself. I was very hesitant to smell this giving the name, but oh, boy! This is not the leather note in Tuscan Leather! Thanks God . This is...  well, I can't even describe it, it is so well blended that I can't pick up the individual notes! The overall feeling is utterly feminine, elegant with some fresh air, slightly sweet and floral. There is something incredibly familiar to me in the later stages.... like I have smelled something similar on my Mum when I was a kid. It doesn't mean that it is old fashioned! On the contrary! I remember a lot of pleasant smells from 80s that the modern perfumery neglects! For its own shame! They pour hundreds of similar smells which often smell "cheap". And boring and not innovative <br />
<br />
For me, White Suede is a masterpiece, easily wearable for every season and occasion </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1455549"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1455549#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1448709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1448709" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="la vie en nose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1253292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="la vie en nose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Santal-Carmin-25292.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25292.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Carmin"title="Santal Carmin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1448709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1448709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1253292">la vie en nose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-19">11/19/21 09:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the dry down this is A LOT like Lacoste Pour Femme (classic version).<br />
YOU'RE WELCOME.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1448709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1448709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1445390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1445390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gemma_ni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1306852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gemma_ni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1445390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1445390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1306852">gemma_ni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-13">11/13/21 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After all, "suede" here can be traced back to synthetic molecules. But how come the molecules in this transparent liquid mimic the velvety and luxurious feeling of suede?<br />
<br />
90% of the scent profile is clean and musky. Some may argue, white musk is probably one of the most boring offers and low-hanging fruits on the market. I think White Suede is like a high-end camera. It takes photos and videos as any ordinary cameras do. But the 10% advancement makes a huge difference in quality.<br />
<br />
Saffron and tea might be the 10%. They give the scent profile a slight bitterness. The market is oversaturated with sweet perfumes and I almost forget how refreshing and "healthy" bitter notes smell like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1445390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1445390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1432478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1432478" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kimberly917"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333032"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1333032.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kimberly917" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Eau-de-Parfum-53.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"title="Shalimar Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1432478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1432478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333032">Kimberly917</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-22">10/22/21 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The herbal notes in this perfume ruin it for me.  They are most likely added to lift the fragrance off the skin but it triggers the wrong sort of olfactory sensations for me.  I get something akin to a hint of insect repellent.  Of course, it is not and I know it is a highly respected perfume.  The musk is creamy and encapsulated in a suede flacon.  The amber adds a slight warmth and the floral is subtle and pretty. If the herbal notes werent so off-putting for me, I would like this more because the musk note is beautiful.  All Tom Fords are $$$$ and I only have so many doll hairs for $$$$ perfumes.  I will need to find a great discount on this one to compel me to add it to my collection but even then I'm not sure I would.  I much prefer Chanel's Les Exclusifs Cuir de Russie for my go to leather and Chanel's Les Exclusifs 1957 for the musk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1432478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1432478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1428003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1428003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evarosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1266133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="evarosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Iris-Perle-48539.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48539.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Perle"title="Iris Perle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1428003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1428003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266133">evarosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-14">10/14/21 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice clean fragrance. Rose soap, suede. Dries down a bit sour and woody. I would never buy this because I think Hermes Caleche does this so much better and is less expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1428003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1428003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzanne.4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383405.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzanne.4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Peony-Blush-Suede-18767.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18767.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Peony & Blush Suede"title="Peony & Blush Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383405">suzanne.4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-04">10/04/21 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dirty like a leather ashtray. Big no from me. Also, surprisingly unisex for a fragrance marketed to women.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1422386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1422386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1420525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1420525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hojoko46584"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377703"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hojoko46584" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1420525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1420525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1377703">Hojoko46584</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-01">10/01/21 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sexy yet squeaky clean. Its nothing new but it just smells classy and fresh. For some of the Chanel perfume, I wear them interchangeable with dupes and I cant tell the difference. But for this, I can always tell if its the real deal. Theres just something different about it. I always wear it when I feel sluggish. Its great to layer with other perfume as well. Performance is 4-6 hours on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1420525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1420525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1413266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1413266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MyMuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324138"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324138.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MyMuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boadicea-the-Victorious/Dragon-90202.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90202.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dragon"title="Dragon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1413266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1413266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324138">MyMuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-19">09/19/21 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me, this is a soft Earl Grey scent, with musky undertones. As it settles, I get a sense of light floralsa velvety violet, rather than rose. With just the faintest hint of sandalwood. Overall, this fragrance is very neutral, almost delicate, and as comfortable and cozy as easing into a well-worn suede jacket. If I close my eyes, I can see myself sipping tea flavored with milk whilst wearing kid gloves on a breezy San Francisco afternoon. Lovely for cooler seasons.<br />
<br />
Update: in cooler months its been reminding me of another fantastic scentGaultiers Fleur Du Male, though White Suede is softer, a bit more powdery and stays closer to skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1413266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1413266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1404014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1404014" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Montourage"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341499"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341499.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Montourage" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Vanille-32907.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32907.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Vanille"title="Aoud Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1404014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1404014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341499">Montourage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-03">09/03/21 21:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received this in a sample set I spent about $400 on.  I should have researched the fragrances in it more closely because half the fragrances lean unisex to feminine and thus I don't feel like I can pull them off.  So I gave this one to my GF to keep at her place and I'm wearing it now because it is the only unisexish fragrance she has as my earlier application of PDM wore off and I like to smell something nice all day.<br />
<br />
It's a beautiful scent but I'm only wearing it because it was this or nothing at all.  I wouldn't think to wear this out and about as it's just not my style although I do own a full bottle of Tom Ford's Black Orchid so I am open to some unisex fragrances.  However for this one in particular I'd prefer to smell it on a woman than myself.  This why I gifted it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1404014"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1404014#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1398849" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1398849" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cp4044404"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379779"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cp4044404" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Water-Splash-54677.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54677.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada LHomme Water Splash"title="Prada LHomme Water Splash"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1398849ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1398849" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379779">cp4044404</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-25">08/25/21 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of gives off grandma's house vibes to an extent but that goes away after the first 15 minutes. It's clean and powdery but is of so slightly animalic... not in a bad or off-putting way though. This really projects off my skin and I struggle to reach for it when it's warmer than 50*F but it's great for winter when it has space to project.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1398849"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1398849#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1389982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1389982" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tovasignature"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/265006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tovasignature" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1389982ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1389982" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/265006">tovasignature</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-10">08/10/21 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sniffed this and immediately a memory from childhood came back. My great-grandmother's things were being cleared out and among a treasure trove of old Avon's there was Tigress with its faux fur cap!  I remember that smell to this day. I merely dabbed and it stayed with me for what seemed like days.  TF White Suede smells to my nose exactly the same.  Its nice but toooo retro for my tastes. Like Tigress a little goes a long way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1389982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1389982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1381172" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1381172" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="strongerwithglue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188338"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1188338.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="strongerwithglue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Eau-de-Soleil-Blanc-48152.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48152.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Soleil Blanc"title="Eau de Soleil Blanc"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1381172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1381172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1188338">strongerwithglue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-25">07/25/21 02:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I typically like scents with some sweetness, and this one is slightly bitter, so I didn't expect it to grow on me so immensely. It does vaguely smell like cigarettes in the opening, which I do not like. But it develops after 10-20 minutes, and I adore it so so much. It is more of a soft musky floral mixed with a sharp earthiness. They balance each other out. The aromatics combine to give a slightly bitter yet cozy clean scent. It's pretty fresh and uplifting. When it has really dried down, after about 4 hours and the sharp earthy vibe has faded, the sweet amber finishes the fragrance strongly. It's unique but also easy to enjoy, white t-shirt clean with a touch of bitter, a mood booster. One of my favorites from Tom Ford, just excellent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1381172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1381172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1374570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1374570" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MHak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360745"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360745.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MHak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1374570ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1374570" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1374570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1374570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1369498" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ckorp8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ckorp8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Soleil-Passion-76111.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76111.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil Passion"title="Soleil Passion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1369498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1369498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357605">ckorp8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-02">07/02/21 09:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this because of lily of the valley mid note of this perfume.  BUT unfortunately I smell almost nothing out of my bottle and had to visit the store to compare it with the store sample to make sure mine wasnt defective or anything.  Turns out that scents are very light and almost imperceivable by me. Alas. The PA said that some other customers also have similar opinion that its rather weak.<br />
<br />
Edit. Revisiting this after well over two years and a quite a bit of amateur nose training, I am now able to detect the scent better and its a soft musky suede scent. Nice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1369498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1369498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366547" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Natashaestelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271811"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1271811.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Natashaestelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366547ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366547" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1271811">Natashaestelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-26">06/26/21 17:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh gosh, I instantly fell in love with this perfume, and loved it even more when I tested it on my skin. Its a dirty, animalic white musk that blends with your natural scent of the skin, and its so leathery that it really smells like your own skin but way better. This is never going to be an offensive perfume at its worst. It smells very familiar yet very pleasant at the same time. It has a moderate sillage and perhaps doesnt really leave much trail, but it does give you a very effortless attractiveness, a je ne sais quoi sort of quality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1366547"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1366547#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366004" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1366004" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nahmpunch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nahmpunch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1366004ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1366004" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311300">nahmpunch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-25">06/25/21 16:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells clean and dirty at the same time.<br />
Light and pleasant. But its not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1366004"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1366004#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1364313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
