padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1335364" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1335364ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1335364" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-01">05/01/21 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>9/10. Quite pleasant first 5 minutes citrus spice. Then disappears and reappears with suede. The spice is expansive and musky. A little sweet. Warm. Familiar. Very well blended. Slightly agitated, not completely relaxing. After 30 mins higher floating florals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1335364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1335364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1334110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; That's it for me. No progression at all. But I'm hooked. It smells a tad synthetic on my skin, yet sometimes, strangely, I want that. Haven't smelled anything comparable to this. Great for the office in fall or spring. (As if anyone goes to an office any more.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1334110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1334110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1319571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1319571" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KhaleesiDany"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1319263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KhaleesiDany" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1319571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1319571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1319263">KhaleesiDany</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-04">04/04/21 21:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Been using this for a few weeks now and for my skin I mostly get a soft clean musk and suede. I didnt like the first try because I was taken aback by the ashtray-y note but this was fleeting. It dries so beautifully that Ive made it my signature scent. <br />
<br />
I feel a graceful powerfulness when I wear this, it really is an elegant scent. I like it better on cooler days so lets see how it will come out during the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1319571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1319571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1319141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1319141" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chaerinia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chaerinia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Romance-825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Romance"title="Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1319141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1319141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234026">Chaerinia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-04">04/04/21 02:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a department store air freshener to me. It isn't unpleasant by any means but for the price tag I get to smell like I walked out of the toilet? <br />
Am I the only one who feels so? I'd never ever wear this personally...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1319141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1319141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1316603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1316603" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BaJu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240568"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BaJu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Map-Of-The-Heart/Purple-Heart-V-5-41107.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41107.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Purple Heart V 5"title="Purple Heart V 5"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1316603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1316603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240568">BaJu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-30">03/30/21 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OMG, love at the first sniff!!! To be honest - unexpected love. But it's really very beautiful fragrance - very subtle musk, a bit of soft suede, lilly of the valley and roses, thyme make such a masterpiece! And musk is very natural, not synthetic. The only thing, which make me hesitant regarding full bottle - average longevity and very subtle sillage. But I'm affraid I will go for full bottle despite of this, especially if I find some good offer...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1316603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1316603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1300068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1300068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sikhulinka1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sikhulinka1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Paris-Deauville-49697.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49697.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paris  Deauville"title="Paris  Deauville"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1300068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1300068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58241">sikhulinka1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-28">02/28/21 08:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased the White Suede (brown bottle version). It has the influence of Chanel 19 and reminds me a lot of Cruel Gardenia by Guerlain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1300068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1300068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1283907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1283907" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beata1723"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/188485"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.188485.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beata1723" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-Limited-Edition-2011-34277.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34277.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flowerbomb Limited Edition 2011"title="Flowerbomb Limited Edition 2011"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1283907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1283907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/188485">Beata1723</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-29">01/29/21 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this because it was cheap, I won't lie - someone was selling their half used bottle and didn't ask for much. What a find. My very first Tom Ford.<br />
<br />
The first sniff was pure musk, then I could also detect the sandalwood. "Hmm, it's good, very nice actually", I thought, but... that's it, no "woah", no confettis, no head over heels. <br />
<br />
Then came the ashtray note. But not really an ashtray - more like a perfumey portrayal of one. This scent was more distinct when I pressed my nose right to my skin. From farther away, not so much. Musk and sandalwood dominated the scene still. <br />
<br />
The scent seemed to "pulse". Every other moment I couldn't detect it anymore, and then suddenly, out of nowhere, ah, there it is again! I loved this part, and that was also the moment I realized why this is such a praised perfume.<br />
<br />
The thing with the suede note is that at first I felt like it was there to give "texture" to other notes. Just like a milk note that often makes the other notes seem "milky". So, my first impression wasn't suede, musk, sandalwood... but suede-y musk and suede-y sandalwood, if that makes any sense.<br />
<br />
Now though, after wearing this for a few days, I can agree that there sure is a separate, very beautiful and elegant note of suede. This perfume is such a treat. The first time I wore this to work I felt like I wasn't wearing nice enough clothes to match it! <br />
<br />
Unlike many others, I can see why this wasn't defined as unisex - for me, this smells like a woman through and through - but that being said, I don't think too much about who the perfumes are designed for. I don't believe there is a single perfume in this world that couldn't be worn by whoever loves the scent, regardless of their gender. <br />
<br />
Lastly I have to point out that every wear has revealed something new, some unexpected side of White Suede. For example, the lily of the valley note wasn't particularly noticeable on day 1, but on day 2, when I wore this to work, the most beautiful lily of the valley captured my senses and was the most prominent note I could detect. It immediately reminded me of my grandmother, so I deduced that she must have had a lily of the valley perfume in her wardrobe back in the 90's, early 00's. Things like this, the memories and remembering ignited by our sense of smell, was exactly what drew me to perfumes in 2012.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1283907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1283907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1274116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1274116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julie_cutie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julie_cutie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1274116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1274116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283034">Julie_cutie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-11">01/11/21 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first fragrance from Tom Ford is White Suede. I love the smell of this so much! It makes me feel elegant, subtle and beautiful. This is perfect for using in the office, because it's clean, refined and classy. Without too much sillage, it stays close to the skin, White Suede is kinda a discreet perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1274116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1274116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1254482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1254482" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frusia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/171616"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.171616.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frusia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1254482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1254482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/171616">frusia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-29">11/29/20 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love White Suede. It's not easy for me to admit it, but I actually love it. <br />
<br />
Many people voted Noa Cacharel as similar to White Suede, and it is. Though it's even more similar to a scent which might not be known to most Tom Ford fans: Evasion by Bourjois. I know Evasion very well, it was my mother's signature scent for years. It never smelled as good on me though. White Suede smells on me like Evasion smelled on my mother - super elegant, wonderful, addicting. <br />
<br />
Even if White Suede is a dupe of Evasion, I must say it's a very good one, possibly an improved version, although I don't have a bottle of Evasion at hand to compare them in all fairness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1254482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1254482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1253931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1253931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LizzieDee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/524606"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LizzieDee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1253931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1253931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/524606">LizzieDee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-28">11/28/20 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>We all know the major perfume families: oriental, floral etc. There is another classification which has mysteriously eluded perfumers thus far: handbag. Its the smell you get when you open a leather handbag that has a powder compact inside it and possibly a pair of leather gloves. Its the 1950s and the handbag (probably an Hermes Kelly bag) is on the arm of a very chic woman in a suit and pillbox hat. Maybe it even is Grace Kelly. Anyway, White Suede is a handbag perfume. <br />
<br />
This stays close to the skin, but the woman wearing this perfume probably chooses eau  de toilette rather than eau de parfum and would never wear a perfume that fills the room or leaves people reeling in her wake. Unusually, theres a subtle floral note that emerges a couple of hours after spritzing rather than being up in the top notes but on the whole I find it quite linear. It needs another spritz every couple of hours or it fades away altogether.<br />
<br />
Overall, this is a well-mannered and rather self-effacing perfume you could wear anywhere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1253931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1253931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1241440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1241440" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="los benjos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251113.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="los benjos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fucking Fabulous"title="Fucking Fabulous"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1241440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1241440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251113">los benjos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-26">10/26/20 06:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Elite" is how my much younger work collegue described the smell of White Suede on me. <br />
<br />
I have no idea what that means, but i took it to be a good thing. I wear this only in colder months or for serious meetings. It is warm, leathery but with a freshness too. It doesn't punch you in the face like Tuscan leather and its not nearly as alpha male. it somehow feels more restrained but in a sophisticated way. It doesn't scream to be noticed but invariably does. <br />
<br />
There's a faint 'older person' smell from the musk sometime but this feels very grown up and adult so i don't mind that aspect to it. <br />
<br />
I should say that as a male i've never had any sense that this is a feminine fragrance, nor do i find it sweet or cloying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1241440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1241440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1225082" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1225082" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gildedcrystal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.997182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gildedcrystal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1225082ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1225082" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997182">gildedcrystal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-16">09/16/20 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume makes me feel like a super fancy lady. Perfect for winter; it's warming and cozy. Too much can give me a headache but sprayed in moderation it's lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1225082"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1225082#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1223215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1223215" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.804692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1223215ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1223215" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692">cpellegrino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-11">09/11/20 21:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Notes: rose, saffron, thyme, mate tea, olibanum, lily-of-the-valley, amber, suede and sandalwood<br />
<br />
Honestly I can only smell amber, suede, sandalwood, and some musk. I used two sprays just because I thought I didn't get enough juice out of the first spray. Even with two sprays its project is very weak. Not worth the money even though its a nice scent. Very inoffensive and unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1223215"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1223215#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1214186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1214186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.804692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1214186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1214186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); On me it was a skinscent from the beginning. If I ever got this I'd get one of those sprays that somehow makes your perfume project a lot. On its own there's no point in wearing it if you want other people to be able to smell it as well. Very safe scent for anybody.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1214186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1214186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1205332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1154438">Marivictory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-05">07/05/20 05:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a soft well-blended powdery musky scent with hints of floral notes. Sits so close to my skin. I overspray this so it projects more but my skin eats it up.<br />
<br />
I need advice because as much as I love smelling this on me I wish it projected a bit more. I guess that's what I got the 100ml for? I'll just keep overspraying but if you are the type to like subtle expensive smelling perfumes - this is perfect for you!<br />
<br />
It is not staying more than 3 hrs on me - unlike some of the TF perfumes I got I have to say performance of this is the weakest. I wanted to love this. Please tell me how to make this last longer and project better. Soo light and pretty flawless smelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1196150"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1196150#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1193909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178146">mareeefrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-28">06/28/20 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mmmmmm.<br />
This is nice. It starts out as a sweet enveloping light floral musk. Sweet and creamy lily of the valley with soft suede peeping through. After 15 minutes a smokey leather jacket vibe appears: like a smokers clothing. A bit salty. A bit dirty. Its kind of awesome. Not many people have commented on the cigarette smell? (Except the person below me. ) Its very noticeable to me.<br />
After a few hours it has faded to a pretty sweet musky skin scent. I like this perfume: its going on my Wishlist...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1193909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1193909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1191913" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1191913" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LateBloomer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164542"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1164542.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LateBloomer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Tamarindo-48286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tamarindo"title="Tamarindo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1191913ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1191913" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164542">LateBloomer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-23">06/23/20 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What note smells like cigarette smoke?! I have never encountered that before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1191913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1191913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1188988" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1188988" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mo-haider"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242231"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mo-haider" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1188988ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1188988" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242231">mo-haider</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-16">06/16/20 06:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most underrated fragrances in the house. It's marketed for women but its completely unisex. <br />
<br />
When I wear it in the summer, it smells fresh to me, like I stepped out of the shower and wrapped myself up with crisp linens and suede. But I can also wear this in the winter; Somehow, the freshness doesn't remind you of the cold you're in, rather, the beauty of the fragrance distracts you from it. <br />
<br />
That said, the performance of the fragrance does leave some room for improvement. On my skin it lasts maybe 2-3 hours before retreating into a skin scent. If the power of this juice was upped a little bit, I'd be wearing this all day everyday its just that good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1188988"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1188988#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1186354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1186354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="espoj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="espoj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Musc-25-Los-Angeles-6338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc 25 Los Angeles"title="Musc 25 Los Angeles"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1186354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1186354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241178">espoj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-09">06/09/20 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WOW!<br />
<br />
My favourite fragrance in my collection, and thats saying something. Easily Tom Fords best in in his line up besides the usual suspects. <br />
<br />
What a musk! I love musk. all types of musk. all expressions of musk and this.... holy shit.. amazing.<br />
<br />
Dont worry about sillage and projection, its a musk.!!!!!! Musks are an anchoring tool and a skin scent as musks normally are but, its still projects for the fist 4 hours and remains heavily and noticeably on skin for another 12+ hours. I even wake up to the smell in my sheets. Whoever gets in your scent bubble watch out...for me its a sex musk. Not a clean and not a dirty musk, but a sex musk.  I feel amazing wearing it and so sexy, so confident. I feel I go out in the world and dominate my arena. thats the feeling white suede gives me. <br />
<br />
I didn't want to share this actually because its my signature scent and I don't want everyone smelling like this as I think this is TF's secret gem, but this is a secret no more. Incredible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1186354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1186354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1185382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You can smell that it is floral but the floral is evened out with the suede and musk. Of course you can pick up the TF DNA, but like all of TF's fragrances, it is an original masterpiece.  I find this wears well when it is a little cooler outside. A great Fall - Spring scent. Definitely one you should try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1163703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1163703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1162098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The first lily of the valley perfume I really adore.<br />
This is mostly musk and lotv together with tender wafts of amber and olibanum, I hardly get any suede.<br />
I'm a bit disappointed about the sillage, but still very happy I got to test it.<br />
<br />
An understated beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1162098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1162098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1156510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1144455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marcel2782"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1099565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1099565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marcel2782" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1144455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1144455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1099565">marcel2782</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-12">02/12/20 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdered and highly scented leather from the beginning. It is notable that there was a concern in feminizing the suede with typically feminine accessory notes, but it reached a point that the suede almost abandoned entirely its animal skin character, bordering the streaks of something artificial, like skin products and creams due to a sensible burning alcoholic character as backdrop (potion-diluting style, kind of medicinal). The potency, however, is timid - an ideal autumn / winter office fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1144455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1144455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1132875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1132875" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emorandeira"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emorandeira" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hedonik/Exquisite-Affair-91814.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91814.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Exquisite Affair"title="Exquisite Affair"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1132875ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1132875" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179391">Emorandeira</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-10">01/10/20 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is for me a musk perfume more... It is nice and overall the quality of the smell of the suede un here , as most leather notes used by Tom Ford, is very high, but i am not sure if It really worths to pay this amount of money for a perfume which doesnt give anything new. There are lot of fragances in the market with similar smell and even better performance, because the oerfumance here is very very moderate. For example musc secret by Bjar which gives a very similar vibe for only 9.95. but for Tom Ford lovers and musk lovers White suede can be a good option for a daytime use during winter.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8<br />
Longevity: 6<br />
Sillage: 5<br />
Quality/price: 4<br />
Versatility: 8<br />
Originality: 5<br />
Global: 7</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1132875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1132875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1126192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1126192" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Konga5000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/943811"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.943811.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Konga5000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Robert-Piguet/Calypso-10535.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10535.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Calypso"title="Calypso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1126192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1126192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/943811">Konga5000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-19">12/19/19 20:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ombre Leather For Her! With a pinch of Dior Fahrenheit for Her? Maybe? This is a ballsy formula that will EMPOWER all ladies who wear it. It's a mash-up of old school &amp; new school ...Vampish and Trampish. Not that I'm going to paint any sort of tawdry picture here, but you can imagine some Las Vegas cocktail lounge lady -- 48 years young,single and swinging-- on her off day waxing and detailing her car with the leather interior. She's got the smell of Turtle Wax on her brow and she lights a Marlboro Light 100 when she's done. She's getting cleaned up and going out on the town tonight for "happy hour" and she has a new pair of suede knee high boots (camel color) for the occasion. This new creation from Tom Ford is a HOOT. And it will trigger some old school memories of older ladies getting all dolled up and going out for a night of drinking and hell-raising. If you think this is a safe blind buy -- you get what you deserve. LOL.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1126192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1126192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1124211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1124211" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nickyt99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/991623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.991623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nickyt99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rance-1795/Laetitia-Millesime-5208.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5208.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Laetitia Millesime"title="Laetitia Millesime"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1124211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1124211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/991623">nickyt99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-13">12/13/19 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of an ashtray in Hawaii from my childhood. I do like it through. Different. But Id expect it to be louder for Tom Ford.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1124211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1124211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1121214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1121214" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Virginnose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Virginnose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Intoxicated-25991.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25991.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intoxicated"title="Intoxicated"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1121214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1121214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104302">Virginnose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-03">12/03/19 06:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Did the most stupid thing. Got this, disliked the dry down, sold it. By sundown the most breathtaking musc overtook all my senses and I cried in disbelief. So yesterday I repurchased. When do I ever learn..patience!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1121214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1121214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1111010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1111010" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1guy1dog3cats"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1149854"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1149854.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1guy1dog3cats" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Jeux-de-Peau-11350.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11350.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jeux de Peau"title="Jeux de Peau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1111010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1111010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1149854">1guy1dog3cats</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-30">10/30/19 03:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, wow, wow. I love White Suede. Chanels Cuir de Russie is a god-tier fragrance, and this feels like a modernized take on that classic. Both feature a powdery floral abstraction over an animalic base. Theres a skanky, smoky leather core in CdR, but here, thats swapped out for a creamy, buttery suede, reminiscent of an airier, fattier version of the leather note found in other Tom Ford scents. Its fresh but substantive, casually elegant, and in its own sly way, sexy as hell.<br />
<br />
When approaching the Tom Ford fragrance counter, youre greeted with a line that sprawls and sprawls. Some in the collection are roaring behemoths, attracting far more attention and cult reverence. Tune out that volume for this much tamer gem. White Suede purrs, poised to seduce those who favor subtlety over braggadocio. <br />
<br />
An absolute must-try for musk and leather fans too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1111010"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1111010#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1110478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1110478" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CaraQ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1206755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CaraQ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/OUAI/Melrose-Place-52552.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52552.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melrose Place"title="Melrose Place"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1110478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1110478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206755">CaraQ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-10-28">10/28/19 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Talk about a multiple personality perfume. First spray - divine! It reminded me of something from childhood, and it was a wonderful something! Suede, sandalwood, amber and a slight hint of smokiness. <br />
<br />
Later in the afternoon?  OMG, help - Dirty. Ashtray. HOW is that even possible??? Truly, it was awful.<br />
<br />
Moral of the story - Get a tester for this baby.  Try it for a couple of days to see if it Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hydes on you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1110478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1110478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1102113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/713693">tandem_4x4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-25">09/25/19 21:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is strong petrochemical leather. Then scent splits in 2 parts on me: leather close to the skin and amazing soft flower-musk aura further from the skin. This aura is so beautiful that I put this perfume to my "love" list. However leather part is just leather and its a bit masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1101160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1101160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1100850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I prefer Bal and probably dont need both in my collection but I will happily use up my decant and would purchase if I saw it reduced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1096485" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beatrix75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.39195.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="beatrix75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Manifesto-l-Elixir-18785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Manifesto l'Elixir"title="Manifesto l'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1096485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1096485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39195">beatrix75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-10">09/10/19 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One if the best fragrance from Tom Ford like a Venetian summer vacation </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1096485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1096485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1084114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1084114" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jareth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.993215.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jareth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Opus-XIV-Royal-Tobacco-75064.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75064.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus XIV  Royal Tobacco"title="Opus XIV  Royal Tobacco"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1084114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1084114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993215">Jareth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-02">08/02/19 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has just the most perfect opening - a similar suede/leather note to TF Tuscan Leather, combined with the most beautiful florals (lush yet subtle). However, the suede subsides incredibly quickly - which begs the the name 'White *Suede'? - and the fragrance is reduced to a simple sweet, musky floral fragrance. Dont get me wrong, this is some fine musky floral, but that suede opening is to die for. Like a modernised version of Cuir de Russie. <br />
<br />
