Then that's pretty much it. The musky floral stage carries on for 30 to 60 minutes, drying down to a very much muted version after hour or two, with the sandalwood replacing the lost florals. However, this is the depressing part for me: what it would have been if it had carried on with a longer lasting suede/leather note...<br />
<br />
I keep getting pleasant wafts of it up to 6 hours later, but only as a skin scent, which is why, I'm guessing, the mixed reports about longevity - some people have differeing views on where 'longevity' stops. <br />
<br />
Alas, I might as well stop pining and buy some more CdR, or get one of those 'design your own' places to make me a special in between version of CdR, TL and this. I've got a craving that this just doesn't fully satisfy. So close though...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1084114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1084114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1082890" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1082890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="psebi101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/769796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.769796.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="psebi101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1082890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1082890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/769796">psebi101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-29">07/29/19 03:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smooth floral leather, very elegant. The muguet in the beginning is a really nice addition to the leather (which is the same leather as in Tuscan Leather, just a polite and airier version). I can get the rose and sandalwood that, together with the musk, create a soft and plush leather.<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1082890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1082890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1074570" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1074570" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JenSin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JenSin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1074570ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1074570" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1172408">JenSin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-30">06/30/19 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a hardcore musk lover, I feel in love with White Suede instantly. It is clean with a slightly animalic edge from the suede. It is good in all season for all occasions. Certainly appropriate for office wear. That being said, I dont believe its worth the retail asking price. Shop around and find a good deal. It took me a year to find it for under for $100 USD. It was worth the wait and I am happy to have this in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1074570"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1074570#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1057977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1057977" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oobunillaoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.204079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oobunillaoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Flora-Cherrysia-53804.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53804.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Flora Cherrysia"title="Aqua Allegoria Flora Cherrysia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1057977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1057977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/204079">oobunillaoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-07">05/07/19 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when this debuted a decade ago i was taken in by the very prominent suede note, the longevity of the clean musk, and the delicate florals that accompanied. fast forward to 2019, and either my nose has changed or the composition of White Suede has - possibly a bit of both. <br />
<br />
upon smelling more recently manufactured bottles this afternoon i noticed White Suede smelled markedly different, which made me pause; i know White Suede is in a brown bottle now but that is the only difference i've known of with regards to this particular fragrance. until this evening.<br />
<br />
the clean musk is now cloying. the florals are rubbery in a synthetic sense. the suede is absolutely completely non-existent. the White Suede i smelled in store and on skin today smells like the sibling of Santal Blush (minus the woody facets) and Soleil Blanc (minus the vanillic undertones or brighter floral notes.) the powder is so very heavy. <br />
<br />
while this fragrance is no longer an option for me, it certainly has its place. ten years ago there was nothing else like it and i loved it with a flaming passion; one of the few feminine fragrances i truly enjoyed from start to finish. whether my body chemistry has changed that drastically or the perfume has is anybody's guess - i would suggest that fans of the original white bottle version test the newer manufactured brown bottle version just to make sure it still agrees with you. a lot can change in ten years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1057977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1057977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1057420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1057420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bree85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/916309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bree85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1057420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1057420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/916309">bree85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-05">05/05/19 16:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I wore this fragrance, my female colleague keep asking me what I'm wearing. I guess this is truly a female's fragrance. But what the heck, I like it so I wear it anyway. Anyway this is my first TF Private Blend. I was about to buy Tobacco Vanille, but it's out of stock, so I bought this instead. To me, this perfume smells like white flowers and a little bit of leather. It kinda reminds me of Johnson and Johnson baby powder, but (of course) this is much much better. Longevity wise, surprisingly adequate than I initially thought. 3 hours projection, and 7 hours skin scent.  If it's around USD 150, it'll easily be my signature scent. But then again, it's TF Private Blend that we're talking about :-/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1057420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1057420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1053568" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1053568" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Al-Dukhan-70979.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70979.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Al-Dukhan"title="Al-Dukhan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1053568ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1053568" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-22">04/22/19 19:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My hats are off to the men that can rock this one with confidence as I certainly cannot -- nor would I ever want to. Glad I purchased myself a sample. Not a bad scent by any means, but also not a very good one either. Especially for the price. It definitely smells dated, feminine, soft, and powdery. Those looking for animalic leather look elsewhere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1053568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1053568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1041680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1041680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kon-nos91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/494286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.494286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kon-nos91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-2012-17796.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17796.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior (2012)"title="Miss Dior (2012)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1041680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1041680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/494286">Kon-nos91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-16">03/16/19 12:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WTF, when I read some reviews of this perfume, I was so disappointed in a way I thought it was my mistake of buying it. Tom Ford brought it back in the classic darker bottle of Private Collection for you that you're confused.<br />
<br />
I was searching like crazy for a musky perfume to be added to my collection, just to seduce a Capricorn. I smelled from Body Shop's white musk to everything interesting from Narciso Rodriguez, you know why. Well, I just have to search slightly more into this musky masterpieces cause musk is addictive and so hard to be blended perfectly now that the original note is banned. I agree because you know from where 'real' musk is extracted, poor deer...<br />
<br />
The only musky perfume I was in love with was Prada Candy Kiss and it reminds me of that special person perfectly. Imagine from all I smelled, even TF's Pure Musk (again reissued recently) White Suede won me! It's so hard to be described as well as so hard to make a musk shine when this note is used as a base for the last memory of a perfume. The 'clean'-soapy-powedery maybe (no powder = iris)-anyway creamy kind of characteristic musky note is missing from here. I am getting something I really want to chew like crazy. Sweet but not gourmand, fluffy but mature. The only problem with TF's perfume is that they are so expensive but they could be amazing if layered with others. Wish me luck, this Capi must be down soon.<br />
<br />
Musk, light suede, saffron = White Suede</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1041680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1041680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1039060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1039060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mike.obi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076908"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1076908.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mike.obi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1039060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1039060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076908">mike.obi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-08">03/08/19 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So apparently the white bottle is back but does anyone know how it compares with the original white bottle and brown bottle? From what I've heard and experienced, the first white bottle is the strongest; lasting at least 9 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1039060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1039060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1038267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1038267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shwets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/159268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.159268.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shwets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Body-Shop/White-Musk-2432.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2432.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Musk"title="White Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1038267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1038267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/159268">Shwets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-06">03/06/19 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a bright 'white' smelling suede! It is musky and  is strong on my skin but too masculine for my liking. Generally this is great for suede lovers and im not keen on leathers either in fragrances unless its not as obvious.<br />
<br />
The dry down after 4 hrs is white musk on me and thats my fav bit! Well suited for a man!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1038267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1038267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1033526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1033526" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Virginnose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Virginnose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Intoxicated-25991.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25991.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intoxicated"title="Intoxicated"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1033526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1033526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104302">Virginnose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-20">02/20/19 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Looooove this!! After a few seconds it turned into my worst childhood nightmare of total tobacco but then it changed back into this lingering soft gentle suede hand in hand with amber and vanilla. By God its good!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1033526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1033526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1030689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1030689" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zesty_calco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zesty_calco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geoffrey-Beene/Grey-Flannel-4608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Flannel"title="Grey Flannel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1030689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1030689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584">zesty_calco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-12">02/12/19 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't say this often about Tom Ford scents but mmm... this stuff is good! Soft, musky, fairly realistic suede. There's a touch of powder and a white florals. The lady at the Tom Ford counter said she likes to layer this with Santal Blush and I can definitely see how White Suede is good for layering.  <br />
<br />
This is unisex leaning feminine with a slight 0ld lady vibe. There is some magic in the way this mixes with the natural smell of your skin. Fine for work and all but the hottest times of the year. Way overpriced for the weak performance. WS becomes soft after about four hours. I'd probably be interested in a small bottle if only it was just a little stronger. I have weakness for leather fragrances and the composition here is great. Maybe a decant! Head down to the Tom Ford counter and get your nose on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1030689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1030689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1027507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1027507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gumbinator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1030473.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gumbinator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Cosmic-Cloud-68355.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68355.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cosmic Cloud"title="Cosmic Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1027507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1027507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030473">Gumbinator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-03">02/03/19 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>White Suede is beautiful. Finally, I've added this beauty to my collection. Off of one slight spray on my upper forearm (for test), I find my bodies heat is slowly amplifying this fragrance. That feeling when you step out of the shower, you can smell your shampoo/shower gel emitting off your skin. It's a great natural smell. As a man, White Suede comes off unisex, as I find the scent morphs with your body chemistry and heat. It's calming. White Suede is musk done in a rather mysterious and seductive way. I would smell this for hours on a woman, and it would slowly evoke imagery of curiosity and pleasure. This is not a scent to wear casually. White Suede is meant to be worn when you intend to entice your significant other, or, perhaps a crush.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="1027507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=1027507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent976892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc976892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bibibling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.835256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bibibling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Beloved-Woman-15184.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15184.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beloved Woman"title="Beloved Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma976892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd976892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835256">bibibling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-30">08/30/18 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm just newly getting into leather scents. I had a huge run with gourmands and florals before this so leathers are a whole new world. Valentina (leather, rose, iris) was my gateway drug, and VC&amp;A's Reve de Cashmere (leather, heliotrope, vanilla) became my addiction so I finally gave White Suede a try.<br />
<br />
You know when people gush about that 'new car smell'? Well this is the 'new purse smell' you never knew you had a thing for!<br />
<br />
It's a very smooth realistic suede layered with sweet light musky floral elements and resins. The florals are well blended but remind me of the sweet makeup scent but more herbal. Powdery makeup rose is blended with energizing mate tea, saffron and thyme instead of violet or iris. The resins (a light touch of amber and olibanum as well as sandalwood) work together to create a creamy luxurious cashmere-like glow of warmth and really round it out. It's a soft, bright, relaxed, luxurious feeling. If your leather/suede purse is starting to smell off, THIS is the perfume you want to spray in there.<br />
<br />
And of course, spray it on yourself. I can't stop sniffing my hands and wrists as I type this. The sillage is at least 1 foot, but it's a light, calm scent, not a powerhouse punch in the nose.<br />
<br />
It wont be everyone's jam. You have to be in that leather mood to really appreciate it. When I was in my gourmand and floral phases, I passed this up for YEEEEAAAARRRSS without even smelling it. I was just like 'Who in the world wants to smell like suede??' but guess what? The time comes when a well blended floral-resinous suede scent is both a cozy comfort and makes you feel energized and daring.<br />
<br />
Don't blind buy, but if you are going through a leather phase, this is a MUST for your to-try list. Don't make a snap-judgment based on a nozzle-sniff or the 1st 5 minutes because it evolves on your skin and needs a few minutes to truly bloom.<br />
<br />
Also - labeled for women but I think men would smell amazingly sexy in this. Definitely unisex for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="976892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=976892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent965887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc965887" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="___lucas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1154169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1154169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="___lucas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Infusion-d-Amande-31044.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31044.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infusion d'Amande "title="Infusion d'Amande "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma965887ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd965887" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1154169">___lucas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-27">07/27/18 06:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is pure sex.<br />
Not a powerful sexy bomb.<br />
But still, pure sex.<br />
<br />
The elegance of the scent reminds me of a wealthy, mature and indipendent woman.<br />
Her sexiness comes from her self consciousness: she doesnt need to show off her skin to become other peoples desire. Her clothes are very minimalistic, ton sur ton combinations, her makeup is barely there and she keeps her hair in a clean bun. Her bag is usually a taupe Kelly or a Phantom by Cline.<br />
<br />
You can detect her scent only if very, very close: are you lucky enough?<br />
<br />
Although the fragrance is labeled as a feminine scent, you should try the fragrance even if youre a man: in this case the sexiness comes from the contrast between the feminine elegance of the fragrance itself and the natural odor of a male skin. The result is not a clearly sex statement achieved by masculine fragrances such as Bel Ami or any other leather-patchouli-vetiver based scent: it is subtle and definitely more intriguing. Give it a try!<br />
<br />
PS: youre gonna love this if you come from Narciso, both For Her or Narciso (it works even if your Arab customer doesnt want anything smelling like Oud).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="965887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=965887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent962641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc962641" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tarquiniese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1152540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tarquiniese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Beverly-Hills/Gold-39465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold"title="Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma962641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd962641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152540">Tarquiniese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-17">07/17/18 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pure heaven. White suede is a cashmere jumper worn for days , it's the smell of your skin when warmed by a fireplace,is the sofisticated yet animalic odour in a suede factory,and the familiar smell of your mum's closet filled with furs and boots and bags..the only thing I point out is the fact that the notes make me think nothing about White..beige or light Golden brown are the colors occurring  in my mind, a butter biscuit suede jacket..Anyway this is a wood leather musky beast yet delicate..notes of aldehides and somethig soapy starts kicking after about 30 minutes but the earthy animalic base stays there mantaining depth to the composition. I smell also something similar to hay,just delicate and from a distance and that's what really ignites my love for this sexy juice.The drydown's all musk and something Woody vanillic still keeping that solar suede texturized note but in really soft and caressing way.Love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="962641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=962641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent947477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc947477" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jg2758"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jg2758" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma947477ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd947477" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1138030">jg2758</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-29">05/29/18 07:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On paper: This smells as feminine as suede can be, to me. Pure suede and white musk. I'm starting to think I dislike white musk, but this is still worth a try for other suede lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="947477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=947477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent938720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc938720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jonmichael02302"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1081819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jonmichael02302" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma938720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd938720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1081819">Jonmichael02302</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-02">05/02/18 16:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled this today &amp; my God what a gorgeous fragrance... NO WAY IS THIS A FEMININE/FEMALE FRAG... If anything, I find it leans more masculine &amp; the only failure here goes out to the imbecile who labeled this a female fragrance. I'm as manly as they come &amp; I'm buying a bottle of this asap!!! Longevity is moderate and man do I wish it lasted longer. Projection is a good 4 feet for an hour or two before it begins to sit closer to the skin but it stays with you throughout the day. I can't wait to own a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="938720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=938720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent929774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc929774" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cvaile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1007140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cvaile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Bvlgari-Man-9403.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9403.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bvlgari Man"title="Bvlgari Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma929774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd929774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1007140">cvaile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-05">04/05/18 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am also very surprised that this was not released as a unisex scent - this is as unisex as they come, and every bit as good as you all have described it. We are surely not alone in considering this unisex, somebody had this in with the testers at the TF counter in the men's fragrance dept in Bloomingdale's today and I am certainly glad they did.<br />
<br />
I've never been a huge fan of heavy, oily leather scents - but I've found that I really enjoy the cooler, brighter suede note.<br />
<br />
This is a magnificent, musky, lightly sweet suede blend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="929774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=929774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent929268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc929268" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="floral08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1128150"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1128150.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="floral08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mendittorosa/Nettuno-37672.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37672.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nettuno"title="Nettuno"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma929268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd929268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1128150">floral08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-04">04/04/18 04:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SO GOOD... I have never thought I would love a musky leather fragrance. I'm not sure if it's the soft powdery suede or the flowers that comes along the way to dry down but it makes me feel so calm and serene.<br />
<br />
I came across this beauty while testing Noir de Noir and Cafe Rose for my never-ending quest to find the perfect rose. SA at Tom Ford counter told me that White Suede is one of her favorites and I should try it as well. I should mention that it's not in the white bottle anymore. Since 2014, it's in grey-brown flanker of Private Blends.<br />
<br />
Longevity is around 6-8 hours on me with moderate sillage. Overall I will enjoy it till summer before it's time for my fresh florals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="929268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=929268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent916962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc916962" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="moonjung.kim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1098672"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="moonjung.kim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-31411.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31411.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna"title="Valentino Donna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma916962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd916962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1098672">moonjung.kim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-01">03/01/18 00:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one really freaked me out when I first tried. The top notes is very strange having gasoline or dry-cleaning material like smell. So I thought it was waste of money. <br />
But after you wear it for 10 min it turns into very creamy and smooth musky scent. Lots of my friends gave me compliments. <br />
Also, it's very office friendly. Not so intruding like other flowery perfume (esp. Chanel). Just neutral and clean. <br />
This one become my signiture.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="916962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=916962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent848653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc848653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mirabele"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/570443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.570443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mirabele" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lolita-Lempicka/L-de-Lolita-Lempicka-455.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.455.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L de Lolita Lempicka"title="L de Lolita Lempicka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma848653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd848653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/570443">Mirabele</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-06">08/06/17 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this one scared me away two years ago or so. there is a turpentine or burned rubber/gasoline note in the opening that doesn't make any sense to me. a note that reminds of a car workshop/ garage with rubber tires, dirty oily clothing of those hard workers, and is very unatractive for me in a perfume. i had to scrub it then. i came to try it again, after testing Cacharel Noa and getting myself Lacoste pour Femme. these three scents seem to be in the same cathegory to me, soft musky suede, skin scent, perfume that doesn't smell like perfume, but rather like a woman, like her skin,like her leather purse, like her soft light suede jacket, like her lipstick and compact powder in her cute leather make up bag. DK Cashmere Mist is a bit fresher but still relevant option. TF White Suede smells a bit like a warm skin, like human being, very soft, clean, sensual, and i have to admit, a bit expensive as well, if such exist. i do love this type of skin scents, my favorite group, scents that are close to skin and doesn't scream about perfume, but rather smell sensual and good. i love drydown of White Suede, after this weird turpentine note goes away. it is musky suede without flowers. i love musk and suede in perfume, and when in combination, it works magic to me. i do love flowers in my garden and my vases but not much in my perfumes, so no flowery is also a good thing for me. i was almost considering to buy a bottle,i liked it so much, but i can not justify the price so it is a no go anyway. i've seen many small bottles on ebay that were more reasonably priced so it is still an option. it has low sillage so i find it very suitable for office, health care jobs, and any other situations where you may consider to respect privacy of others. longevity isnt so good on me, i get 3-4 hours and then it goes away. <br />
anyway, TF White Suede reminds me too much of Lacoste Pour Femme (which i have) and Cacharel Noa (which i had and probabyl will have again) (not alike scentwise but gives the same vibe, satisfiesthe same type of craving), so i will rather be using those two before i decide to spend so much for something with a turpentine note in the opening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="848653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=848653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent848386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc848386" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BellaX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067824.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BellaX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Decadence-31226.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31226.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Decadence"title="Decadence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma848386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd848386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067824">BellaX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-05">08/05/17 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm surprised TF labled this feminine, as a woman I actually think this one is quite masculine. For any men out there who likes this, don't hesitate wearing it. I can imagine it's very nice on a guy. I don't own this but I have tried it a few times now only because a friend recommended it. White musk, suede and very powdery and a bit soapy almost like washing powder. Not unpleasant, quite nice but not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="848386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=848386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent846094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc846094" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arabian Knight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/690095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.690095.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arabian Knight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma846094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd846094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/690095">Arabian Knight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-29">07/29/17 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"White Suede"...is a dainty, pleasant scent, but it only whispers as to what it could have been.<br />
<br />
It opens with a gorgeously realistic suede note that, much to my disappointment, fades almost instantly into a bath of green, soapy lily of the valley, partnered with the vaguest rose and a barely perceptible herbal pepperiness.  Less than 20 minutes later there is no suede, no amber, just creamy musk and airy florals...it smells rather like I have just washed my hand with a bar of Dove soap.  It's clean, soft and cheerful, but it's not what I want from this line, for this price.<br />
<br />
Had that suede note lasted, it would have been so much richer and more unisex in appeal, but with the soapy lily note dominating, I can only recommend this as a casual daytime scent for middle-class women who wear pashminas and 'brunch'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="846094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=846094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent844277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc844277" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YolkMedusa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1073264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YolkMedusa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma844277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd844277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073264">YolkMedusa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-23">07/23/17 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening note is some genuinely interesting soapy white flowers; quickly transitions to probably the finest suede note I've ever encountered.<br />
<br />
For me the suede note eventually completely breaks down into an unappealing rubber/tar-like aroma. I've never had much luck with leather scents tho.<br />
<br />
Very soft scent, almost disappeared at times.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="844277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=844277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent839997" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc839997" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohsen95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohsen95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma839997ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd839997" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995817">mohsen95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-10">07/10/17 04:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="839997"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=839997#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent829138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc829138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/La-Fille-de-Berlin-17162.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17162.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Fille de Berlin"title="La Fille de Berlin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma829138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd829138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-04">06/04/17 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the few Tom Fords I hadn't tested on skin yet, it is pleasant from first sniff - smooth, quite sensual. The suede is subtle and doesn't leap out as it does in, say, Cuir de Lancome (which I find very raw suedey though lovely).<br />
<br />
White Suede does dry down quite sweet though ( a sort of vanilla cupcake style sweetness), but it has a counter balancing saltiness (maybe thyme and amber effect?)which to my nose gives this an almost beachy skin-scent mood.<br />
<br />
I love the use of lily of the valley to perk it up. On its own LotV can be a bit bathroom soap-like but it's nice in this perfume.<br />
<br />
I'm not mad keen on the white musk in this, but it is after all the white musk series!It does dominate at the end, alonside the sweetness, so it ends up maybe a bit less elegant than the start.<br />
<br />
Having said that, I'm not keen on sweeter perfumes generally, so if you don't mind the sweet edge this is a very nice perfume.<br />
<br />
Longevity, a noticable warm skin-scent after 6 hours. Sillahe soft to moderate, depends on how much you spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6386"comment_id="829138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html?ccid=829138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent797454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc797454" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyAKAMrClean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyAKAMrClean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma797454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd797454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014646">TonyAKAMrClean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-28">02/28/17 19:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the few Tom Ford scent that's "for women" instead of unisex... then why do I love it so much?! At least I'm not the only one...<br />
<br />
